data.detailedDescription:
Listen up, cryptocucks, I’ve got a treat for you guys this time around. If you don’t know what the fuck a Bitcoin even is or how sites like Coinbase work, then this one might not be for you. Some people say that investing in any cryptocurrency is a gamble. Hell, the folks over there trying to rocket Dogecoin to over $1 know that shit all too well. People will invest millions in meme currencies, but Bitcoin is the big daddy of crypto. It’s the most respected and most used version of this stuff out there. Just one of the damn coins is worth tens of thousands. But what if investing in a fluctuating currency isn’t enough of a risk to get your heart beating?

Then, you can turn to actual gambling over at Bc.game. It’s an entirely crypto-based casino where Bitcoin is king. It launched back in 2018 and has been a haven for Bitcoin addicts looking to add even more risk into their lives. And, man, you fucks seem to love this site. It’s one of the most popular online casinos that I’ve stumbled across, with well over 3 million gamblers trying their luck at the games on here every month.

Fun Site with a Modern Design & Eye-Catching Graphics

You can use standard deposit addresses and coin wallets to link your funds to this site. You’ll have to sign all of the tax documents and waivers, but I’m sure you cucks are familiar with that process by now. You can also convert your coins into the site-specific currency you can trade out for USD or whatever else you want to cash out with. It’s all safe and legitimate. You won’t have to worry about getting swindled or losing your hard-earned coins. This is one of the most transparent casino sites that I’ve ever seen, but I’ll get into those nitty-gritty details here in a little bit.

Loads of Standard Casino Games and Site-Specific Titles

Let’s talk about game options. You can scroll through and check out standard shit like slots, a live casino with dealers, and the usual stuff. But there are also site-specific games with unique concepts like Crash or Cave of Plunder. Most end up being slot machines or other simple games with added factors, graphics, and stories to go along with them. It’s nothing too crazy or complex. You can hop into any game and play a few rounds in just a couple of minutes.

Rewards System that Gives You Bonuses the more You Play

I liked that you can hover your cursor over any game preview and see what the house edge is. That’s the level of transparency I want to see in online casinos. You also get basic game details like the game’s genre, if you can try a demo of it, and if the game works on mobile. Bc.game has a “fairness” tab on each game where you can read about how they come to their calculations, so you’ll never feel left in the dark or anything like that.

24/7 Live Chat Support & A Great Mobile Experience

And, as I expected from this high-quality site, the mobile support does not disappoint. You can play most games in the catalog right there in your mobile browser and log into your account no matter where you are. All of the same features are available to you, and it’s easy to link your mobile app wallets and deposit funds without much headache or jumping through hoops.

MissAVDH’s Favorite Features

The vast number of cryptocurrencies this site accepts is fucking wild. You can trade in coins and currencies that I hadn’t even heard of until today. They accept all of the popular ones and even some of the meme currencies out there. But, hey, money is money. You can hedge your bets here using whatever form of online dosh that you feel most comfortable with. Hell, most online casinos don’t even take Bitcoin, let alone over a dozen cryptocurrencies.

MissAVDH’s Suggestions

MissAVDH’s Final Thoughts

data.title: Wildz
data.description: Wildz is an online casino with over 1200 games with live board games and a wealth of rewards. It's time to bet
data.detailedDescription:
When you visit Wildz for the first time, you may be inclined to think that it’s a place where you can watch a hot granny get her fuck on while riding a motorcycle. Or jumping out of an airplane. I love to jerk off to about any kind of porn out there, but this isn’t that kind of fucking site.

That granny, who may be an actor, is just the mascot for Wildz. It’s one of those online casinos that have been popping up ever since COVID made brick-and-mortar casinos nonexistent. But let’s get back to that fucking mascot. Why the hell did they do that? A cartoon character would have worked just fine instead of an old bat dressed in motorcycle gear.

Oh well. You can’t fault Wildz for trying something different. Yeah, I could have used the word daring, but I didn’t. MissAVDH hates puns.

Enough about some actor in cheesy motorcycle attire. Does Wildz have the fucking cock and balls to make you suck on the casino’s house and gamble the night away? Because this is where it really counts, all I can say is, ‘maybe.’

Accepts all types of payments

Depositing your cash is pretty damn easy for the most part. Players can deposit funds via Visa/Mastercard credit/debit cards. If you use American Express, Discover, or another type of card, sorry, pal, you are shit out of fucking luck! It is best to get a card that the rest of the world accepts!

If you don’t want to use a credit or debit card at all, don’t worry about it. Wildz allows you to deposit via Skrill, MuchBetter, ecoPayz, Trustly, and Neteller. You can also deposit winnings to your bank account or Paysafecard (for some reason, you can only withdraw money to Paysafecard, you cannot deposit it into your Wildz account). Players can also withdraw their winnings to Skrill, MuchBetter, ecoPayz, Neteller, and even credit cards.

One thing to note is that there are a couple of typical options missing. Withdrawing and depositing money via PayPal, for example, is missing. That could be due to some Terms of Service (ToS) agreement that keeps them from funding online gambling sites. Who knows, but there has to be a reason why they are missing.

What is even more peculiar is that Wildz does not allow you to deposit and withdraw using cryptocurrency. Most online casinos at least allow you to withdraw and deposit using Bitcoin. In most cases, only one kind of cryptocurrency that is offered will suffice. Wildz needs to seriously make it more convenient for users to deposit and withdraw their money. While it is nice that they offer all kinds of payment options, they need different withdrawal options to make it all the more convenient for the players.

Earn rewards

The most straightforward way to get rewards is by earning free spins when you fill the Progress Bar. Every time you go up a level (called ‘Levelz’), you also earn a free spin toward different games. You can also earn a free spin on certain games if you miss a couple of consecutive rounds, thanks to their Spinback feature.

Once you accrue at least five free spins, you get to play them. If you have below five free spins, you cannot play—those the rules, as annoying as they may be. But as you can see, you still get to earn a ton of free spins as it is, so it’s not a big deal.

If you keep coming back for more, you will also earn up to 20% cashback. They will even provide you with a personal account manager if you are a Loyalty+ member. They treat you like you’re a part of the team if you are a regular. That sounds pretty damn awesome if you fucking ask me!

Fuck load of games

Your favorite types of table games are present as well, like blackjack, roulette, video poker, and baccarat.

Players can also gamble live with others. They can play classic table casino games like craps, blackjack and roulette variants, Texas Hold ‘Em-types, and other kinds of poker variations. Instead of going into an actual casino and playing a round of blackjack with the local loser that stays so long at the tables until he pisses his pants, you can gamble with others around the world from the comfort of your own device.

Who fucking needs real-world casinos when you’ve got all the best games right in your goddamn pocket? No more hanging around old fuckers that smell like ointment and won’t stop talking to you. With so many fucking casino games to choose from, you will not have difficulty finding something to play. Whether you want to play live-action table games or try your luck at the slots, there are plenty of games to enjoy. You have your work cut out for you if you want to play all of them, though!

Made for mobile

Sure, you could enjoy playing all of these games on your desktop, with the lights turned down, a bottle of your favorite adult beverage, and a blowjob from your sex toy. You may even feel like you are in a casino for the first time in forever.

Or you could join the rest of us in the 21st century and gamble wherever you are. Because that is the beauty of online casinos like Wildz. You do not have to be in a physical location to enjoy these timeless games and earn money from them to boot!

data.title: BetFury
data.description: BetFury is an online casino that allows you to enjoy the money and win cryptocurrency. Try to start playing the casino games you like
pros: earn passive income by staking bfg tokens
huge variety of casino and in-house games to play
data.detailedDescription:
Casino gaming hasn't evolved in what feels like fucking forever. It is goddamn ridiculous if you ask me. From video games to those boring ass card games your grandmother plays, every facet of gaming has changed with the times. But not casinos. Even when online gambling has been trying to break out and have its moment, countries like the United States have kept it from evolving.

But thanks to COVID-19, it looks like online gambling becoming the norm is a certainty. And while online gambling sites do indeed allow players from all over the world to place IRL bets (even those from the US), other gaming sites are future-proofing their efforts and thinking beyond the traditional casino model.

BetFury is one of those sites. They realize that the best way to grow their online gambling brand is to go over traditional FIAT payment methods. That's why they allow players to purchase and gamble with various types of cryptocurrency!

Who says you need to use the usual methods of payment to gamble? If you already have a cryptocurrency wallet of some type, chances are you can use it to win big! Check it out and see if BetFury is the kind of place where you want to place your bets!

Online casino where you can bet crypto

While we're not yet able to strap our bodies into a VR space and walk around a virtual casino spanking the polygonal ass of a waitress, how we can fund our gambling habits sure as shit feels like the future. BetFury sees what's on the horizon. They understand that cryptocurrency will undoubtedly be one of the most popular, easiest, and discreet ways to pay gamble. They also seem to understand that online gambling is here to stay, and it will supersede physical casinos sooner than later.

That is why BetFury allows players to place their bets using all kinds of fucking cryptocurrency! They don't solely accept Bitcoin like many online casinos. BetFury understands that there are so many additional cryptocurrencies out there. They would be doing a disservice to their players if they only accepted Bitcoin.

What types of cryptocurrency can you use to play? Besides Bitcoin, you can also use popular cryptocurrency options like Ethereum, Binance Coin, Tether, BitTorrent, and more. In fact, there are so many cryptocurrencies currently offered on BetFury, that the online casino was advertising a spring event where they were unveiling the support of 50+ altcoins!

Tons of altcoins available to bet

So what types of altcoins do BetFury plan to support? For starters, they are adding Enjin (ENJ) coin. It's a coin associated with all of those crazy fucking NFT sales happening at the moment. Chances are, the price of the coin will increase, making it a decent altcoin to support. If you have ENJ coins, consider gambling with them and seeing if your winnings can grow even more!

What else does BetFury aim to support? Chainlink (LINK) is another altcoin that is supported. It's one of the upper-tier altcoins that gets plenty of buzz. Also available is Brave's Basic Attention Token (BAT). This can be mined in the Brave browser. You may even have some BAT available in your wallet. If so, consider transferring some of those coins over to BetFury and gambling with your altcoins!

This isn't even close to the number of altcoins that are available on BetFury. The plan is to add five new altcoins a week during Spring 2024. Eventually, there will be over 50 altcoins for players to bet, exchange, and ultimately win!

If you have browsed BetFury and how to start winning, you probably noticed that they have their own token called BFG. Get to know this token. There are plenty of ways to earn some real-world money by holding your earnings strategically!

Stake your payouts

What does all of this have to do with BetFury? Plenty. You can actually earn more by staking your BFG tokens. Like with any other altcoins, when you stake a token, you are gaining even more. Again, you are essentially earning on the interest.

By staking, you will have to hold your BFG tokens in your wallet for a while. They will essentially become frozen. This is so the BFG blockchain can operate and use your tokens to complete its functions. By using your staked tokens and other people's wallets just like yours, the blockchain can continue to run smoothly and optimally at all times.

So what's in it for you? When you look at BetFury's staking page, you will notice that you can see the estimated payout for different types of cryptocurrency. Under the heading 'estimated payout,' notice the drop-down menu that lists BFG tokens' different values. These tokens are listed as 100k BFG, 500k BFG, and 1M BFG. Choose one of these values closest to how much BFG you have in your wallet to see your estimated earnings.

You can then see how much you would earn per day, per month, and a quarter across different cryptocurrencies. The top three cryptos that are listed are Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Binance Coin. As of this review, if MissAVDH staked 100k BFG, I would earn 0.00007075 Bitcoins per day. That may not sound like a lot, but when compared to a quarter, I would earn 0.00636772. That's a much higher number.

If I had 1M BFG tokens, I could earn 503 Tether tokens per quarter to give you even more of an idea. It pays to stake your BFG coins. Especially if you are not going to be using some of them for a certain period, in essence, playing on BetFury and staking a portion of your tokens could allow you to earn some form of passive income. That's fucking amazing!

All types of games to play

Many of them you have probably seen in real-world casinos before. I'm talking about slots, for starters. You can play slot games like Pharaoh's Empire, Rolling in Gold, and more. There are also timeless table games like Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, and more. For those who want their fair share of poker, users can play games like Lightning Dice and Texas Hold'Em.

These types of poker games also have live table games. Hell, you can even play Monopoly as a live game. If you have ever wanted to win big playing Monopoly, now is your fucking chance! Or you can choose to play one of their other in-house games, like Plinko, as made famous by The Price is Right. Moreover, players can also play popular gambling games like Keno, Hi/Lo, and even Coin Flip. Yes, you can even gamble on the flip of a coin if you're too goddamn stupid to figure out these simple parlor games.

If you think you kick a lot of ass at games like Plinko and Hi/Lo, consider entering one of the tournaments. Or, if you prefer, play Dice, Circle, Crash, or another casino game, prove your worth in one of their tournaments. Start ranking, start earning cryptocurrency for your winnings, and beat the house for that huge payday that you deserve!
